seriesStmt.title: František Ignác Antonín Tůma: A thematic catalogue of his works

annot.p: da capo of the first 42 bars

physMedium.p: In 4o; upright format. Hand-ruled paper, 10 staves per page in light brown ink and music in dark brown ink. Three sets of parts in three wrappers, comprising (1) the Sequentia (20 parts), (2) the Offertorium (22 parts), as well as (3) the Sanctus, Benedictus, and Agnus Dei (22 parts), respectively.

annot.p:
Comprises Sequentia to Agnus Dei. These movements have been archived under a shelfmark with an Introitus and Kyrie by Georg Reutter the Younger. Thus, they have been attributed to the latter (see P. Norbert Hofer’s edition in Denkmäler der Tonkunst in Österreich, vol. 88 (1952), and his
catalogue of Reutter’s works, entry 46/4).

titlePage.label: [cover title]

annot.p: parts for S, A, T, B (solo and coro), clno 1, clno 2, trb 1, trb 2, timp, vl 1, vl 2, vlne, and org
